notes: This dataset adds annotation of multiword expressions and multiword named entities to the original PDT 2.0 data. The annotation is stand-off, stored in the same PML format as the original PDT 2.0 data. It is to be used together with the PDT 2.0.
title: Multiword expressions in the Prague Dependency Treebank 2.0
